initial.name: Hi, I'm Jean Paul
initial.description: I'm a software engineer focused on building high-performance mobile apps with clean code and great design. Let's turn ideas into reality!

about.title: A bit about me.
about.history:
I specialize in mobile development, with over 6 years of experience creating robust, intuitive, and secure solutions for Android, iOS, and web. I have expertise in Flutter, Dart, React Native, React, JavaScript, and TypeScript, as well as experience with tools like Firebase, Datadog, and Codemagic. I excel at creating responsive interfaces, implementing scalable Design Systems, and maintaining a constant focus on user experience.

Throughout my career, I have directly contributed to performance improvements, code organization, data security, and interface componentization in various mobile and web projects. I also have strong experience in UX/UI, motion design, and prototyping with Figma and Adobe Suite, using animations and micro-interactions to make products more engaging and pleasant to use.

items.title: Maestro Mateus
items.description:
Routine management system for employees of a large supermarket chain. Developed in Flutter, Maestro Mateus manages tasks, departments, and daily routines of collaborators.

Main features:
- Routine management by department
- Daily task control
- User profile with renewed interface
- Product validity control
- Notification system
- Productivity reports
- Integration with internal systems

Recent improvements:
• Enhanced performance for smoother navigation
• Faster and more efficient login
• Improvements in feature loading
• New feature: Emotional Health

Complete solution that optimizes routine management and increases operational efficiency of employees across all network departments.

items.title: Gupy EduCorp
items.description: Gupy EduCorp is a solution for employee development based on knowledge doses and Gamification, making learning interactive and fun, enhancing company results. Ranking, points and rewards, as well as others such as an online quiz, the Battle, are resources that Gupy EduCorp uses to motivate company employees in an innovative way in their training through the application.

items.title: Brasil Card Digital
items.description:
BRASIL CARD, operating in the Brazilian market since 1999, is present throughout the national territory. We offer the Private Label card customized for each business and the BrasilCard credit card for end customers.

Now with VISA brand, BrasilCard offers facilities for online purchases and in thousands of establishments, providing greater purchasing power and securing customer loyalty.
